content:
I'm glad you found the recommendations helpful! "Diaspora" and "Leviathan Wakes" are both excellent choices that explore complex themes and ideas in the sci-fi genre.

Regarding The Good Doctor, I'm afraid I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or opinions, nor do I watch TV shows or keep up with the latest seasons. However, I can tell you that The Good Doctor is a highly acclaimed medical drama series that has received praise for its portrayal of autism, its diverse cast, and its thought-provoking storylines.

If you're invested in the characters and their storylines, that's great! It's always exciting to be passionate about a TV show and care about the characters' journeys. If you'd like to discuss The Good Doctor or any other TV shows, I'm happy to chat with you and provide information or insights.

By the way, since you're interested in reading more sci-fi and fantasy books, I'd be happy to provide more recommendations or discuss your favorite authors and books in the genre. Feel free to ask me any questions or share your thoughts on sci-fi and fantasy literature!
